nodes.text: The containment section was a Rakata prison facility in Section X, a region of the Belsavis prison on the planet Belsavis. Located in the area designated Block 53, the subterranean vault stored mutated creatures, and was raided by the Dread Host during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The containment section appears in Section X, a Daily Area added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.5.
